contents: Article 21 (Business) ① The Foundation carries out the following projects to achieve the purpose of Article 1. Revised 2014. 6. 11. 1. Issuance and operation of foundation bonds to raise funds for student loans, 2. Student loans, 3. Analysis of student loan support projects and their effectiveness, 4. Development of student loan support programs, 5. Consultation and information related to student loan support. 6. Management of student financial support projects entrusted by central administrative agencies, local governments, public institutions, private corporations, or individuals, 7. Development and operation of support programs for talent development 8. Installation of student welfare facilities such as dormitories, etc. Operation, 9. Management of college student work scholarship projects and operation support for related cooperation programs, 10. Implementation of policy research and planning projects to improve business efficiency from No. 1 to No. 9, 11. Tuition and student loan support for higher education institutions Survey and analysis of statistical status, 12. Provision of related data necessary for tuition and student loan support at higher education institutions, 13. Profit-making business necessary to achieve the purpose of Article 1, 14. Other student loan support necessary to achieve the purpose of establishment of the foundation. Businesses related to, etc., ② Profit-making businesses under Paragraph 1, Item 13 may require approval from the Minister of Education. Revised 2014. 6. 11.
